root.name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports Challenge
root.description: OverviewIn Tiny Toon Adventures: Wacky Sports Challenge, you guide the cast of characters from the TV-show as they compete in different sporting challenges. These events range from soccer to miniature golf. The SNES version is unique, as it was one of the few titles to utilize an SNES multitap, allowing up to four players to join in on the games.
